about_the_game:
Five nights at Tinky's is a trial and error game that is inspired by fnaf,
where you play as someone who is low on money and searches for a quick way to make money,
after finding a nightguard job that lasts 5 nights at the "Tinkys Lasagne Place" for alot of money you instantly applied for it and ofcourse they chose you.
Its gonna be your first night in "Tinkys Lasagne Place" and maybe its your last...
Can you survive the 5 nights?



Survive in a small room with 1 main door to a hallway, 1 vent infront of you and 1 vent behind you.
You can control your vent doors by using your tablet you received and close the doors infront of you by using their buttons.
Check the doors by using the light switch or the flashlight but do not flash the wrong animatronics!
Keep the monsters out of your room and do not let them get inside!
Explore after each night to find clues on what happened to this place.

Five nights at Tinky's Includes:
-A storymode with multiple choice endings.

-Five Nights that get harder the further you progress.

-One extra night for the challenge.

-Four Monsters with unique abilities and different weaknesses. | Do not let them get you.

-Custom Nights once you beat the main game. | Set the monsters on the level you like.

-Endless Nights once you beat the main game with a steam leaderboard. | Showoff in the public steam leaderboard.

-Customizable Office. | Random item drops that are tradeable and marketable.

-Achivements not too hard and not too easy.

-Goofy phonecalls. | They are really goofy.

-Trading Cards and Emotes depend on the sales of the game.

This game contains jumpscares. ( They aren't that scary :3 )

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu Latest Version
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1620 2.7Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD4800
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11.6
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T9300 2.5Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6630M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

name: Five Nights at Tinky's

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Pentium 4 NW 3.4GHz With HT
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8800 GTS
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Soundcard or integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3210 Dual Core 3.2GHz Or AMD FX-9590 4.7GHz Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Quadro M2000/Nvidia Geforce 950 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SoundCard Or Integrated

short_description: Five nights at Tinky's is a indie horror game, where you apply for a job as a nightguard at the "Tinkys Lasagne Place". You only need to work for 5 nights to receive your payment, but soon you will find out that you are not alone... Can you survive the 5 nights?
